description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
41589 - Add new overload: AutoFitColumns(int firstRow, int firstColumn, int lastRow, int lastColumn, AutoFitterOptions options)
41553 - Copy a cell over a range of cells
 
Enhancements
41520 - Smart Marker Grouping
41514 - Copy ListObjects/Tables in copying range.
41506 – Saving Workbook to CSV is not keeping columns for each row
 
Performance
41527 - System.OutOfMemoryException on loading the workbook
 
Exceptions
41477 - Mono problem – Unknown Heap Type: SmartAssembly
41554 - NullReferenceException calling DeleteRow (external data connections)
41552 - Worksheets.GetNamedRanges causes NullReferenceException
41534 - Exception: “Object reference not set to an instance of an object” - while saving the Excel file
41538 - "Invalid chart MarkerStyle string val" while opening a template file
41606 - "Invalid FontUnderlineType value" while saving an Excel file
 
Bugs
41566 - Rendering PDF from Excel ignores Alpha
41511 - Print area header and footer does not appear when converting Excel to PDF
41498 - Graphic not exported properly
41582 - Excel Sparklines don't get saved in the rendered image
41576 - Image Contrast not preserved when rendering image from Excel
41541 - Some text/data is wrongly shared at the top
41560 - Incorrect calculation of GETPIVOTDATA in Aspose.Cells 7.4.2.x
41551 - Problem with XLSX to HTML conversion
41515 - Problem with XLSX to HTML conversion II
41496 - Problem with truncated cell text in the XLSX to HTML conversion
41578 - Cells next to Pivot table are populated with Pivot table’s values
41569 - Changing Pivot table’s data source will cause problems
41561 - Set Table as Pivot Table's data source problem
41556 - Issue with Pivot ranges
41509 - Pivot table’s formatting problem
41581 - Calculated values are not accepted by Pivot table's RefreshData() method
41580 - Error found when saving an Excel file
41563 - Excel to Html problem - the cell's characters are over wrapped
41540 - Pivot table borders are wrongly visible in the PDF
41453 - Pivot chart in the generated PDF is not the same as Pivot chart in the generated XLSX file
41489 - Data series Line styles’ cap Type property is reset to default
41530 - Data labels appear outside of the chart area
41478 - Changing the position of data labels is not working
41548 - Issue with a custom font color of the legend entry for a particular series
41597 - Hidden columns extracted as string data table have incorrect and empty values
41590 - Conditional formatting issue
41575 - After saving the file with Aspose.Cells, the last two columns move to the next page break
41562 - CalculateFormula is not working right
41550 - Copying a range of columns that are grouped, the grouping options/attributes are not copied
41547 - Values are hidden after saving an XLS file
41523 - Background of Ole Objects is changed to blue after double-conversion (XLS->XLSM->XLS)
41516 - Aspose.Cells does not update formulas properly when deleting rows
41513 - Excel formula optimizations in XLSX and XLS break formula calculations
41529 - Incorrect formula after deleting row when referencing a ListObject Header
41521 - ActiveX controls do not get copied when using Workbook.Copy(source)
41517 - Cell.HtmlString - Font size in the Cell is not correct
41594 - The generated XLSX's sorting does not work the same way as per MS Excel
41588 - RAND() and RANDBETWEEN() are not working
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
